title: IAAP CPACC Certification Preparation Course
description: This course will provide you with the knowledge you need to pass the exam to become a Certified Professional in Accessibility Core Competencies (CPACC) through the International Association of Accessibility Professionals (IAAP). The course covers all topics covered on the exam in detail, with self-test quizzes, and links to external resources for further study.
topics: CPACC Certification, Basic Disability Concepts, Theoretical Models of Disability, Types of Disabilities, Disability Statistics, Disability Etiquette, Benefits of Accessible Design, Web Accessibility Principles, Universal Design for the Web, Universal Design for the Physical World, Universal Design for Learning, Usability and Accessibility, Myths and Misconceptions about Accessibility, Accessibility Standards and Laws, Organizational Governance and Management
